1151.content: Since Naruto never had a childhood and he never had a real maternal figure in his life, Tsunade decided to be the mother that Naruto never had. At first it wasn’t easy trying to get Naruto to cooperate with Tsunade, but after a lot of coaxing and after some examples of care, Naruto became the baby that he is today. You see, Naruto stayed a baby, even when Tsunade offered him the choice to stop. Today, Naruto has scheduled naps, he eats mostly puréed food and formula, if not, then just regular milk. He constantly gets changed at least several times a day and he even goes to a nursery. Many of his female friends supported his decision and even babysit him at times, while his male friends are not firm supporters of it, they do respect Naruto’s decision. So let’s take a look at a day, or possibly all, of Naruto’s life!

132.content:
Hinata Uzumaki, wife of the Hokage and ex heiress to the Hyuga clan had been reduced to that of a baby, and by her own children. Some way some how her son Boruto and her daughter Himawari had made her go from the mother of the family to the baby of the family. She wore cutesy clothing that a baby or toddler would, she had scheduled naps and bedtimes, all her food was cut up and fed to her if not puréed mashed or in a baby bottle and of course was diapered and changed by her kids several times a day. Having accidents that at some point became very much out of her control.

It was something of a habit she’d picked up. weather or not it was something her children intended to happen or an accidental side effect was anyone’s guess.

The big baby lady was currently wearing a purple romper dress with a really obvious bulge of a diaper underneath. Himawari had put her in one of the cuter diapers they kept stocked in their household so at least she got to have the cute little flowers she liked plastered across her padded bottom. She also wore really cutsie matching velcro shoes with little violet socks frilling out around her ankles and a little yellow hair clip on her head to tie the look together.

Her daughter led the way as she held her mothers free hand and held an oversized diaper bag containing spare diapers, changing supplies, as well as toys snacks and bottle of juice to calm and satiate the big baby if need be on her shoulder as well as some grocery bags they’d pick up throughout the day “come on mama, we need to...

Hinata struggled to keep up as she toddled behind her daughter, she had months of experience walking around with thick diapers between her legs almost everywhere, way more than she would have liked, but for whatever reason she never acclimated. If she had to guess whatever kept her in need of the diapers kept her from getting used to them.

After a while of keeping pace with Himawari, philosophizing about her strange existence and sucking her thumb she looked up and realized they’d already gotten home. “Alright, I’ll set you up in the living room with some toys and you can play while I get lunch made, ok?”
